Dear all, 

We are archiving arc.gz files created by Heritrix through the N=
etarchive Suite. We have strong reasons to believe that one of our files ha=
s been corrupted on the disk (its size is only ~19 MB, and it is not possib=
le to unzip it conventionally). 

Now we would like to "extend" the file to=
 a valid arc.gz file so that it is possible to view its contents through e.=
g. wayback all the same (which is not possible at the moment). Is there a s=
tandard way to do this? 

Thanks in advance, 

Eleonora
